content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Extraction System Interface at Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5)
Consists of:
• Extraction system burner inserter at Position(x=-3.5, y=27.5) with drop position Position(x=-3.5, y=28.5)
Use-case: Serves as the input point for extracting items from the resource patch.

### Copper Cable Factory Interface (around Position x≈2.5–3.5, y≈16.5–19.5)
Consists of:
• Cable factory input chest at Position(x=2.5, y=17.5)
• Burner inserter (fuelled with coal) at Position(x=1.5, y=17.5) that feeds items from the chest
• Burner inserter (facing RIGHT) at Position(x=3.5, y=17.5) to aid in connecting the interface
• Burner inserter (facing UP) at Position(x=2.5, y=16.5) as part of the belt connection chain
• Assembling machine at Position(x=1.5, y=19.5) handling copper cable production
Use-case: Processes and transfers copper plates into cable components by interfacing raw inputs with assembly.

### Depot Belt System at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
Consists of:
• Wooden chest placed as a belt depot at Position(x=3.5, y=15.5)
• Dedicated transport belt segment at Position(x=4.5, y=15.5) adjacent to the depot chest
• Depot burner inserter at Position(x=3.5, y=14.5) positioned next to the depot chest to receive items
Use-case: Acts as an intermediate transfer station to route items from the extraction system toward the factory interface.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• Belt Connection Error (Steps 210, 211, 214, 215, 216, 217)
 – Transport belts are repeatedly failing to connect because the target is a Prototype.SteamEngine.
  Tip: Always attach an inserter (or a comparable valid target) between the transport belt and a steam engine to ensure proper connection.

• Placement Distance Error (Step 212)
 – Attempted to place a wooden chest at (3.5,15.5) from player position (0,0); the distance (≈15.89) exceeds the permitted maximum.
  Tip: Move closer to the intended placement position before attempting to place an entity.

• Undefined Variable Error (Step 212)
 – A NameError occurred because 'target_chest' was not defined.
  Tip: Verify and use the correct variable name (e.g. using target_pos or depot_chest) to reference the intended entity.

• Inventory Shortage Error (Step 213)
 – The agent attempted to place a wooden chest even though none was available in the inventory.
  Tip: Ensure that the required item exists in the inventory before attempting placement.
